welcomeSlide.title: Welcome to MyCoach!
welcomeSlide.description:
Start recording your workouts right now!
Plan, develop, achieve goals, share progress.
Become a better version of yourself!

coachSlide.title: Find your coach
coachSlide.description:
Plan your workouts with your personal coach.
Find the best one in your area.

communitySlide.title: Join the community
communitySlide.description:
Connect with the sports community.
Share your best practices, tips and successes.

genderStep.title: Please select your gender
genderStep.text: Let's get to know you better. This will help you better track your progress.

heightStep.title: Enter your height
heightStep.text: It is better to measure height in the morning, since by the evening a person’s height may decrease.

weightStep.title: Enter your weight
weightStep.text: Floor scales may show an incorrect result if the floor surface is uneven, so the scales must stand in the same place.

usernameStep.title: Enter username
usernameStep.text: You need to come up with a username. You can change it at any time in the Settings.

avatarStep.title: Upload your avatar
avatarStep.text: Click to upload your avatar. You can do it later in the Settings.

email.invalid: Invalid email address. Please correct and try again

password.invalid: Minimum 6 characters: uppercase and lowercase characters and numbers.

fullName.tooShort: Full name is too short - should be 1 chars minimum
fullName.tooLong: Full name should have maximum 50 characters
fullName.invalid: Full name can only contain cyrillic and latin letters or '-'

username.invalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and the following symbols: '_', '.'.
username.tooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
username.tooLong: Username can't be more than 20 characters

photoAccess.title: Access is denied
photoAccess.message: You've refused to allow this app to access your photos!

cameraAccess.title: Access is denied
cameraAccess.message: You've refused to allow this app to access your camera!
